//import '../styles/hero.scss' import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Link from 'next/link'; const firebase = require('firebase/app'); const PicturesUpload = () => (
) var uploader = document.getElementById('uploader'); var fileButton = document.getElementById('fileButton'); // Listen for file selection fileButton.addEventListener('change', function(e){ // Get file console.log('here----->'); var file = e.target.file[0]; // Create storage ref var storageRef = firebase.storage().ref('sweet_gifs/' + file.name); // Upload file var task = storageRef.put(file); // Update progress bar task.on('state_changed', function progress(snapshot) { var percentage = (snapshot.bytesTransferred / snapshot.totalBytes) * 100; uploader.value = percentage; }, function error(err) { console.log(err); }, function complete() { console.log('Completed file upload'); } ) }); async function uploadPicture(req) { } export default PicturesUpload
